title: GET_INTERIOR_PORTAL_ENTITY_POSITION
content:
0x9B7AB83C// GetInteriorPortalEntityPosition
void GET_INTERIOR_PORTAL_ENTITY_POSITION(int interiorId, int portalIndex, int entityIndex, float* posX, float* posY, float* posZ);Parameters:interiorId: The target interior.portalIndex: Interior portal index.entityIndex: Portal entity index.posX: posY: posZ: Returns: Portal entity position.Examples:Lualocal playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)
local portalIndex = 0

if interiorId ~= 0 then
  local count = GetInteriorPortalEntityCount(interiorId, portalIndex)
  for i=0, count-1 do
    local x, y, z = GetInteriorPortalEntityPosition(interiorId, portalIndex, i)
    print("portal " .. portalIndex .." entity " .. i .. " position is: " .. vec3(x, y, z))
  end
end
codeBlocks:
// GetInteriorPortalEntityPosition
void GET_INTERIOR_PORTAL_ENTITY_POSITION(int interiorId, int portalIndex, int entityIndex, float* posX, float* posY, float* posZ);

local playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)
local portalIndex = 0

if interiorId ~= 0 then
  local count = GetInteriorPortalEntityCount(interiorId, portalIndex)
  for i=0, count-1 do
    local x, y, z = GetInteriorPortalEntityPosition(interiorId, portalIndex, i)
    print("portal " .. portalIndex .." entity " .. i .. " position is: " .. vec3(x, y, z))
  end
end
